dcterms:creator: A. K. McCallum
K. Nigam
J. Rennie
K. Seymore
dcterms:description: Cora is a paper citation network. Each node is a paper. There are 2708 papers and 5429 citation links in total. Each paper is associated with one of 7 classes.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: C. L. Giles
K. D. Bollacker
S. Lawrence
dcterms:description: CiteSeer is another paper citation network. CiteSeer contains 3,312 papers and 4,732 citations in total. All these papers have been classified into 6 classes.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Pubmed is a larger and more complex citation network compared to previous two datasets. There are 19,717 vertices and 88,651 citation links. Papers are classified into 3 classes.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Wikipedia contains 2,405 online webpages. The 17,981 links are undirected between pairs of them. All these pages are from 17 categories.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia

dcterms:creator: J. Leskovec
J. Kleinberg
C. Faloutsos
dcterms:description: Email-eu is an Email communication network which illustrates the email communication relationships between researchers in a large European research institution. There are 1,005 researchers and 25,571 links between them. Department affiliations (42 in total) of the researchers are considered as labels to predict.
dcterms:title: Email-eu

dcterms:creator: M. Ji
Y. Sun
M. Danilevsky
J. Han
J. Gao
dcterms:description: DBLP is an academic community network. Here we obtain a subset of the large network with two types of nodes, authors and keywords from authorsâ€™ publications. The generated subgraph includes 27K (authors) + 3.7K (keywords) vertices. The link between a pair of authors indicates the coauthor relationships, and the link between an author and a word means the word belongs to at least one publication of this author.
dcterms:title: DBLP

dcterms:creator: W. Wang
Y. Wang
J. Zhang
dcterms:description: BlogCatalog is a social media network with 55,814 users and according to the interests of users, they are classified into multiple overlapped groups. We take the five largest groups to evaluate the performance of methods.
dcterms:title: BlogCatalog
